name: verifagents
description: Production-ready verifiable agent systems built on ERC-8004

scripts.install-modules: for dir in modules/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm install); done
scripts.test-all: for dir in modules/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm test); done
scripts.build-all: for dir in modules/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.deploy-all: for dir in modules/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run deploy); done
